long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
User's of Infinity Domains by Pool.com can use this extension to resolve Infinity Domains and be redirected to the site defined by the domain owner. 

After installing this extension and you enter the name of a registered Infinity Domain, the extension will redirect you to the URL defined in the domains metadata. If you enter a normal domain, your browser will behave normally. 

Only install this if you want to use Infinity Domains, that's it's only use.
